item.title: Lootify Codes (January 2025)
item.content:encoded:
https://www.ign.com/articles/lootify-codes

Redeem these Lootify codes for free coins and potions!

If you're on the hunt for new Lootify codes, IGN's here to help! We've got all the active and working Lootify codes for January 2025, which will let you claim free coins and potions so you can level up your character quicker in the Roblox action RPG.

Active Lootify Codes (January 2025)

Here are all the active Lootify codes in January 2025 and the rewards you can get for redeeming them:

  • COIN - 1,000 coins
  • DISCORD20K - 4x Coin Potion I, 4x EXP Potion I, 4x Luck Potion I, 4x Roll Speed Potion I
  • POTION - 1x Coin Potion 2, 1x EXP Potion 2, 1x EXP Potion 2, 1x Roll Speed Potion 2

All Expired Lootify Codes

Below, you'll find a list of expired Lootify codes that no longer work and cannot be redeemed as of January 2025:

  • POWERFIXED
  • LOOTIFYHYPEHYPE

How to Redeem Lootify Codes

Tto redeem codes in Lootify. follow the steps below:

  1. Open the Lootify Roblox Experience.
  2. Select the cog button in the top-right corner.
  3. Enter your code in the "code..." field.
  4. Check for any spelling errors or mistakes.
  5. Click the "Confirm" button to redeem the code.

Why Isn't My Lootify Code Working?

If the code you're trying to redeem in Lootify isn't working, it's likely due to one of two reasons. If there's a spelling mistake in the code then in won't work. Double check there isn't a typo, and also see if capital letters are in the right places as Roblox codes can be case sensitive too!

If you checked and everything is correct then that means the code is unfortunately no longer working. Roblox codes tend to be time-sensitive, and are only active for a limited amount of time. So if you see a code you like the look of, don't delay in redeeming it.

How to Get More Lootify Codes

New Lootify codes are shared by the developer Yes Madam on the official Lootify Discord server. While we check for new Lootify codes regularly, the quickest way to get new codes is to sign up to the experience's Discord, where you'll be able to see the latest codes posted in real-time.

What is Lootify in Roblox?

Lootify is an action RPG with a Dark Souls feel to it. The Roblox experience makes you face off against groups of fantasy-inspired enemies, which at first seem overpowered and tough to defeat. When you die, a FromSoftware-style "You Died" screen even appears! Like the Souls games, you can grind for EXP to level up your character and make them more powerful. But the best way to get stronger is via the game's loot mechanic, which lets you keep opening chests to try and find better gear to power up your character.

Dion has spent over five years doing games journalism for UK national newspaper websites and is now a writer for Gamer Network. He's been gaming for over 30 years and still has every single console he's ever gamed on in his collection.
